cmp: 未 (1-3 p.m./8th earthly branch/not yet/did not/have not/not)
mng: different, unique, special, very, (classical) to behead, to die, to cut off, to separate, to surpass

exm.mng: special glory, distinction, rare honor, one's laurels, it's a privilege (to meet you)
Manjushri, the Bodhisattva of keen awareness
to behead, capital punishment, desperate struggle, life-and-death
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
Manjushri, the Bodhisattva of keen awareness
